There's always something going on in Monticello - from Opera House performances, to art exhibits, to shopping at unique local venues, to soaking up history, to exploring the area's unspoiled wilderness.
Check out current the Chamber of Commerce happenings and event listings

About Us
Content Box (10001)
Welcome to City of Monticello!  We are located in Jefferson County, just 24 miles east of Tallahassee and five miles north of I-10 in the heart of beautiful North Florida.  A National Main Street Community, Monticello is home to a charming downtown, abundant natural resources, and friendly people.
Images on Page (10002)
Springtime in Monticello

no documents

City Council
Content Box (10001)
The Monticello City Council is composed of five elected city-wide representatives. The Mayor position is selected by the Council Members each January. We are honored to have Gloria Cox serve as Mayor for 2025. Vice-mayor for the year is Katrina Richardson. Council Members serve four-year, staggered terms. Staggering the terms of council members helps ensure continuity of the Council and allows for more seasoned members to continue to serve as newer members are elected into the roles.
Current Terms:
City Council Group 1
[Mr. George Evans] - 1/2023 to 1/2027
City Council Group 2
[Mayor Gloria Cox] - 1/2023 to 1/2027
City Council Group 3
[Mr. Brian Bachman] - 1/2024 to 1/2028
City Council Group 4
[Mr. John Jones] - 1/2024 to 1/2028
City Council Group 5
[Ms. Katrina Richardson] - 1/2024 to 1/2028
